short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rename AWS service names of the favorite bar on the console

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your AWS console with this Chrome extension by renaming service icons. It automatically shortens long names to concise abbreviations.

Custom mappings for service abbreviations can be set in the Options page:

Default mappings are given for some services.
Add custom mapping as "original name, new name", one mapping per line.
"AWS" and "Amazon" prefixes are removed by default, but custom mappings override this.

Examples:
'DynamoDB, DDB': Renames "DynamoDB" to "DDB".
'DynamoDB,': Removes "DynamoDB" from display.

Source: https://github.com/shimo164/re-name-favbar
